name: coolio
description:
A guy named coolio is trying to escape a factory in the future, there are time machines that send him back in time where the doors were still working fine. Escape the factory and get the freedom you had before.


-- collisions made with a tutorial (cause im dumb lol) by doc_robs

-- if you have any problems being stuck in the wall then just press C, i cant seem to find a resaon why the player gets stuck in the ground sometimes. also if you get stuck on the game over screen click refresh on the page.
